traits.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The gnome has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: War Pick
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success
